room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Total Escape in Winston-Salem
room_description:
Framed and wrongfully incarcerated, you are desperate to escape prison. Breaking out of prison seems like an impossible task, but you were just temporarily transferred to a small local sheriff's office, and now seems like the time to try.
You've heard rumors of a man named Donny who escaped from this very cell last year, and now it looks like he's trying to help you do the same! You make your plan with his help, and tonight while the guards are distracted you will make your move. Will you be able to escape prison before the guards return in an hour?
